comments.en:
Japanese version of the Epson Stylus Pro 7600.

Large format photo printer (24 inches wide, A1 format).

UltraChrome model with 7 inks (CcMmYKk) or dye ink model with the usual 6 inks (CcMmYK).

Supported in Gimp-Print 4.2.2rc2, 4.3.4, or newer. Biggest problem for the Gimp-Print team is not having a test device.

Consumables/Refills: 7 separate ink cartridges: Cyan, light cyan, magenta, light magenta, yellow, black, light black (UltraChrome inks), second black cartridge (dye ink)
